snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include an analysis of Facebook’s attempts to make money from advertising, some interesting buildings that are going...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Tuesday, selections include an analysis of Facebook’s attempts to make money from advertising, some interesting buildings that are going to rise in Silicon Valley and a discouraging anecdote from a freelance journalist about his dealings with an online news site.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Kickstarter Undressed and Evernote's Ambition
